name: Toasty (Hoimar, Drk, AdamGoik, Bunny Trail Junction)
name_original: Toasty (Hoimar, Drk, AdamGoik, Bunny Trail Junction)
description:
A toasty oven escape.

  • Eat muffins
  • Collect muffin tins to hold more muffins
  • Shoot your enemies with toast rockets
  • Find The Holy Butter

and...

Escape!

____

WASD - player movement
Spacebar - jump / double jump (upgrade)
Shift - Run
LMB - Shot with the toaster upgrade!
Escape - to immediately return to the main menu

Hint: Kill gold cuttlery for +5s bonus time - but is it worth it?
